00010  public function options($option){
00011   foreach($option as $key=>$val){
00012    if(!isset($this->defaults[$key])){ continue; }
00013    $this->$key = $val;
00014   }
00015 
00016   return true;

00019  protected function parseOptions($options){
00020   foreach($this->defaults as $key=>$val){
00021    if(is_array($options) && isset($options[$key]) && !empty($options[$key])){
00022     $this->$key = $options[$key];
00023    }

00026    }
00027   }
00028  }
